familyMemberEthics.description: Former partner in The Trump Equitable Fifth Avenue Company, of which Pres. Trump retains an ownership interest. In 2017, Pres. Trump earned $100,001 - $1,000,000 in rent income from The Trump-Equitable Fifth Avenue Company, valued at None (or less than $1,001). Value reported reflects bank account only. Entity's other holdings and assets are reported elsewhere; see attached schedule. Pass-thru entity, New York, NY.
